text: Mweewelhelheke aholhelhi inyu ni uvara chinolhehera aya, ukhalhawaya yayo phi noshiha uthana ni uhiyu, ushunga minepa chinyu. Ni ayo phi nohalha urweeha malhove anaacha mitheko chaya mmiholho wa Nlhuku. Mweewelhelhaka, anooteelhiya vanovara aya mitheko chaya, khanowoonani thoko nsigo. Mwaahipangeke chiicho, anoochukulhacha, khannowa mwaapatta ifaida iriyoothe.
